kannada_original: ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಕುಳಿತರೆ ಅಲ್ಲೆ ಕವಿತೆ ರಚಿಸುವ ಕೆಲಸ
english_transliteration: Elli kuḷitare alle kavite racisuva kelasa
english_translation: The work of creating poetry wherever one sits,
Is it the drizzle of the Malenadu region during Shravana?

kannada_original: ಮಾನಸಿಕ ಹದ ಬೆರೆತ ದೈವಕೃಪೆ ಕೊಡುಗೆ ಅದು
english_transliteration: Mānasika hada bereta daivakṛpe koḍuge adu
english_translation: That is a gift of Divine Grace mixed with mental readiness (temperament).
Is the poem the smile of God! – Muddu Rāma.
